Name: Death Slave : You Need to Master Death
About the game: Death Slave is a 2D puzzle-platformer where the player must intelligently kill their character in different ways to gain new powers to solve platforming challenges. There are no lives or continues in Death Slave. The only way to proceed is to find the right way to send your character to his untimely demise to give him the right ability he needs for the obstacles in front of him. Death isn’t failure in Death Slave It’s the force you need to master. Key Features * Unique death mechanic that grants a new power based on how you died Death isn’t failure in Death Slave It’s the force you need to master. * 8 different power-ups, each with a variety of uses to overcome the toughest challenges you need to master. * 40+ distinct levels and countless puzzles across a variety of worlds every level has unique design. * One-of-a-kind pixel art style * Soundtrack composed by the music director for the Dennis D. Stehle * Hidden collectibles in each level increases replayability and unlocks a secret ending Estimated total playtime: 12-15 hours
